snippet: Chief Charlie Beck of the Los Angeles police was reappointed Tuesday to a second five-year term despite concerns about the department’s disciplinary policies and openness with information.
abstract: Chief Charlie Beck of Los Angeles police is reappointed to a second five-year term despite concerns about the department’s disciplinary policies and openness with information.
lead_paragraph: Chief Charlie Beck of the Los Angeles police was reappointed Tuesday to a second five-year term despite concerns about the department’s disciplinary policies and openness with information.

headline.main: California: Police Chief Gets New Term
headline.print_headline: California: Police Chief Gets New Term
